title: ATLAS  - Confirm reception of ALL Clients by Atlas - Test Environment
time_sequence: CK - SENDING OF CLIENTS TO ATLAS - TEST ENVIRONMENT

task_list.instruction_title:
Dear ATLAS Team,
Please confirm you've received ALL clients :
_- Company 302 on TEST environement
- Company 303 on TEST environement
- Company 304 on TEST environement
- Company 305 on TEST environement

**SQL request : **

--TAB=COUNT_CLIENTS_1
-- RECORDS=ALL
SELECT CLI.NBR_CO_0145 AS SOCIÉTÉ,
       count(*),
       min(cli.nbr_client_0145) AS \"MIN_CLIENT\",
       max(cli.nbr_client_0145) AS \"MIN_CLIENT\",
       to_char(min(cli.date_time_crea_rec_0145), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS \"BEGIN_DATE\",
       to_char(max(cli.date_time_crea_rec_0145), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS \"END_DATE\",
       to_char(min(cli.date_time_crea_rec_0145), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS \"MIN_TIMESTAMP\",
       to_char(max(cli.date_time_crea_rec_0145), 'HH24:MI:SS') AS \"MAX_TIMESTAMP\"
       

--COUNT(*) AS NOMBRE
  FROM NHDBO.T_CLIENT CLI
 WHERE NBR_CO_0145 in (302, 303,304,305)
   AND TRUNC(CLI.DATE_TIME_CREA_REC_0145) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE-3)
   AND CLI.UPDATED_BY_0145 LIKE '%BIQ1%'
 GROUP BY CLI.NBR_CO_0145 --, to_char(CLI.Date_Time_Crea_Rec_0145,'YYYYMDD');
 order by 8 desc```
